text:
Cold European winter and
low storage capacities.
Slow wind speeds and dry conditions
weighed on renewables’ energy output

European Comission proposes
legisation on security of
gas supply

Russia demands gas
payments settled in rubel

New regulation that
gas storagesites must be
filled to at least
80% of their capacity by
Nov. 1, 2022

G7 agrees on oil price
cap on Russion oil
long_text: The $60 price is higher than the level at which Russia currently sells its crude oil — which is trading at a discount to benchmark prices. That gives Putin room to dismiss the West's move as meaningless. He has threatened to cut production, which could drive up global oil prices, and to not supply countries that sign up to the cap.

Die Volksrepublik kaufe weniger am Sportmarkt
ein und schließe stattdessen zusätzliche Langfristverträge für LNG mit Laufzeiten von zehn Jahren oder länger ab.

EU Parlament discussions
on Gas price cap.
